https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/n7Sjm7BPh3yi1jrl92Z07S6EeqC.jpg The granddaughter of a prominent politician loses her husband in a fiery explosion. Her husband is under investigation prior to his death and she vows to clear his name. Before I Say Goodbye
